definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: It actually has a much greater chance of fulfilling our stakeholder's needs.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，它還大大增加了滿足出資方需要的機會。

sentences.english: We have decided to invest in some new video-conferencing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定出資購買一些視頻會議設備。

sentences.english: The free shares shall refer to the shares obtained without making contribution.
sentences.chinese: 乾股是指未出資而獲得的股份。

sentences.english: to review and verify company regulations of wholly state-owned enterprises financed by the Commission.
sentences.chinese: 承辦所出資的國有獨資公司章程的審覈工作。

sentences.english: When there's no profit I can't fund new projects and sign new artists.
sentences.chinese: 如果賺不到錢，我無法爲新項目出資，無法簽下新人。

sentences.english: The new dam is a major construction project, funded by the government.
sentences.chinese: 新水壩是政府出資建造的一個大工程項目。

sentences.english: Libbey, who died in 1925, endowed the Toledo Museum of Art.
sentences.chinese: 1925年逝世的利貝出資成立了託雷多藝術博物館。

sentences.english: Other guilds will offer to set p shop in your cities depending on the govenor and your actions.
sentences.chinese: 別的行會將會根據你的政府和義舉來出資建立商店。

sentences.english: For the registration of establishment of an investee company, equities shall not be used for making an initial contribution.
sentences.chinese: 被投資公司設立登記的，股權不能作爲其首期出資。

sentences.english: This is a dormitory in Thailand that my mom and dad underwrote. And every year about 30 students.
sentences.chinese: 這是在泰國的一個由我的媽媽和爸爸出資的學生寢室。

sentences.english: At the same year should a of the Japanese Jin friend meeting invite, leaving for the day to hold personal calligraphy exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 同年應日本晉友會出資邀請，赴日舉行個人書法展。

sentences.english: This study was funded by private industry, including companies that produce the compounds being studied.
sentences.chinese: 該研究有私人產業出資，包括生產這些複合物的公司。

sentences.english: Who owns it, or sponsors its development?
sentences.chinese: 誰擁有它，或誰爲它的開發出資？

sentences.english: With raid growth of the economy, human capital investment becomes the general trend.
sentences.chinese: 隨着經濟的高速發展，人力資本出資已經是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: The foundation is the sole funder of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 獨立調查委員會由該基金會獨家出資創建。

sentences.english: Section two analyzes the criterion for the objects of the non-cash contribution.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分探討作爲非貨幣出資的財產應符合哪些標準。

definition: to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
